item.title: Apple's MLS Season Pass drops to as low as $25 for the rest of 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Apple's MLS Season Pass drops to as low as $25 for the rest of 2025
bullets: Read more about how we evaluate products.
The end of any sports season is usually the most exciting part, and MLS fans can watch the climax of the 2025 campaign for a discount.
As it has done each year around this time since it locked up the rights to the top North American soccer league, Apple is offering the MLS Season Pass at a discount for the remainder of the season.

Inter Miami have the most games remaining due to the team's participation in the Club World Cup, so Lionel Messi fans might get to see quite a bit more of him — especially if his squad makes the MLS Cup playoffs.

item.title: Technology Sep 1, 2025 Elon Musk replies to Pakistani man's 'warning' to Danish man that Danes will soon be exterminated in their own country, and there will only be Pakistanis Elon Musk has ignited debate by agreeing with a Pakistani man's claim about demographic shifts in Denmark, highlighting his ongoing concern about global population decline. Musk argues that declining birth rates pose a significant threat to civilization, potentially leading to economic stagnation and labor shortages. He has also warned about Japan's population decline, suggesting AI as a potential solution.

review.headline_rewrite: Technology Sep 1, 2025 Elon Musk replies to Pakistani man's 'warning' to Danish man that Danes will soon be exterminated in their own country, and there will only be Pakistanis Elon Musk has ignited debate by agreeing with a Pakistani man's claim about demographic shifts in Denmark, highlighting his ongoing concern about global population decline. Musk argues that declining birth rates pose a significant threat to civilization, potentially leading to economic stagnation and labor shortages. He has also warned about Japan's population decline, suggesting AI as a potential solution.
bullets:
Tesla CEO
Elon Musk has one again stirred debate over global population decline.
The post shared consists of a video in which a Pakistani man was seen claiming that Danes will soon be âexterminatedâ in their own country and replaced by Pakistanis.
Musk has now responded to the video claiming that the Maths of the Pakistani man is correct.

The Pakistani man said, âWe shall stay sitting on your hearts for the rest of life man, we have got 5 children and you have only 1 and 2.â
âIn the next 10-15 years there will be more Pakistanis than Danes in this country,â added the Pakistani.

We are in millions.â
Poll
What role do you think AI should play in addressing labor shortages due to population decline?
Another Pakistani man present in the same video said, âI got married and I am also having 5 kids tomorrow.

Grammarly launches new AI agents to assist students and professionals with writing tasks
Grammarly has introduced eight new AI agents within its AI writing surface, 'docs,' designed to aid students and professionals with diverse writing tasks.
These agents offer functionalities like citation finding, plagiarism checking, and AI detection, alongside features predicting reader reactions and providing rubric-based feedback.
This launch signifies Grammarly's move towards agent-based AI to enhance writing across various platforms.
